value_i18n.en_US: EVP is our Employee Volunteer Program, born out of Liferay's vision to see people reach their full potential to serve others.
Now it’s time to benefit a great cause through your service and giving.
Go to “My EVP” and submit a form with details about your service or grant request.
Your EVP Team and manager will review your request, and if everything looks good,you’re approved!
Encourage ande inspire others by sharing your experience
Do you know an awesome nonprofit that you want to serve or support? Great, let’s get started!
